title: Accessing Mobile Food ordering
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is using the Ballpark App
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on a team page that allows mobile food ordering
AND the user taps ‘Mobile Ordering’
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken to MOO Food ordering app

title: Homepage for MOO Food Ordering
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has tapped Mobile Food Ordering from any ballpark team page
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the MOO Food Ordering App
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken to the homepage for food ordering

title: ‘Welcome to ‘field_name’’ displays as header
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has transitioned to the homepage for Mobile Food Ordering
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the header
custom_expected:
THEN the header will display ‘Welcome to ‘Field-name’ 
AND the field name will be replaced by whatever field the user entered Mobile food ordering from

title: ‘Browse Concessions’ button is available on the homepage
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the homepage of the native Mobile Food Ordering app
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks on the top towards the header
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Browse Concessions’ button is available

title: Tapping Browse Concessions transitions user to the concessions search screen \
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the ‘Browse Concessions’ button
custom_expected: THEN the user will be transitioned to a search page to browse locations

title: App is locked in portrait
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is navigating the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user rotates their device to Landscape
custom_expected: THEN the app will remain in portrait

title: Open Orders cards display on the homepage
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the homepage
AND the user has previously placed an order
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the middle section of the Homescreen
custom_expected: THEN the order cards will display

title: Order card displays the order placed time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the homepage
AND the user has previously placed an order
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the open order card on the homepage
custom_expected: THEN the order card will display the time the order was placed

title: Order card displays the location
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the homepage
AND the user has previously placed an order
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the open order card on the homepage
custom_expected: THEN the order card will display the location the order was placed for

title: Order card displays the ‘View Order & Barcode’ link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the homepage
AND the user has previously placed an order
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is viewing the order card on the homepage
AND the user taps the ‘View Order & Barcode’ link
custom_expected: THEN the user will be navigated to the Order Confirmation screen

title: Tapping ‘View Order & Barcode’ navigates user to the Order Confirmation screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the homepage
AND the user has previously placed an order
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the open order card on the homepage
custom_expected: THEN the order card will have the 'View Order & Barcode’ link available

title: The Last closed order card displays on homepage
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the homepage
AND the user has previously placed an order
AND the order is already picked up and closed
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the last card on the homepage
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Last Order’ card will be the final card and available

title: Last Ordered card displays the order closed date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the homepage
AND there is a ‘Last Ordered’ card available
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the the ‘Last Order’ card
custom_expected: THEN the Last Order card will have the date the order was closed available

title: Last Ordered card displays the location
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the homepage
AND there is a ‘Last Ordered’ card available
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the the ‘Last Order’ card
custom_expected: THEN the Last Order card will have the order location available

title: Last Ordered card displays the ‘Add Order to Cart’ button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the homepage
AND there is a ‘Last Ordered’ card available
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the the ‘Last Order’ card
custom_expected: THEN the Last Order card will have the ‘Add Order to Cart’ link available

title: Tapping  ‘Add Order to Cart’ button for Last Ordered card adds order to cart
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the homepage
AND there is a ‘Last Ordered’ card available
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the ‘Add Order to Cart’ button on the last ordered card
custom_expected: THEN that specific entire order will be added to the cart

title: Credit card is charged upon placing order
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the cart
AND the user has items in the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a valid credit card as a payment method
AND the user taps ‘Place Order’
custom_expected:
THEN the order will be placed
AND the card will be charged

title: eCash is charged upon placing order
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the cart
AND the user has items in the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects eCash Account as a payment method
AND the user taps ‘Place Order’
custom_expected:
THEN the order will be placed
AND the eCash account will be charged

title: Order card displays as 'open order' after card is charged and order is placed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the cart
AND the user has items in the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a valid credit card as a payment method
AND the user taps ‘Place Order’
custom_expected:
THEN the order will be placed
AND the card will be charged
AND the order card will display as ‘Open Order’ until the user scans the barcode at the terminal

title: Order card displays as 'open order' after eCash is charged and order is placed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the cart
AND the user has items in the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects eCash Account as a payment method
AND the user taps ‘Place Order’
custom_expected:
THEN the order will be placed
AND the eCash account will be charged
AND the order card will display as ‘Open Order’ until the user scans the barcode at the terminal

title: Orders section is available on the homepage
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down the homepage
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Orders’ section is available

title: Order History button is available on homepage
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down to the Orders section
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the ‘Order History’ button available

title: Order History button navigates user to the Order history screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Homepage
custom_steps:
WHEN the user scrolls down to the Orders section
AND the user taps the ‘Order History’ button
custom_expected: THEN the user will be navigated to the Order History screen

title: Payment section is available on homepage
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down the homepage
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Payment’ section is available

title: Payment methods tab is available
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down to the Payment section
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the ‘Payment Methods’ button available

title: Use eCash tab is available
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down to the Payment section
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the ‘Use eCash’ button available

title: Help section is available on the homepage
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down the homepage
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Help’ section is available

title: Help & Faqs button is available
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down to the Help section
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the ‘Help & Faqs’ button available

title: Terms & Conditions tab is available
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down to the Help section
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the ’Terms & Conditions’ button available

title: Privacy Policy tab is available
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls down to the Help section
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the ‘Privacy Policy’ button available

title: User is navigated to Help & Faqs screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Homepage
custom_steps:
WHEN the user scrolls down to the Help section
AND the user taps the ‘Help & Faqs’ button
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be navigated to the Help & Faqs screen
AND the Help information will be available to the user in a form of a web view

title: User is navigated to Terms & Conditions screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Homepage
custom_steps:
WHEN the user scrolls down to the Help section
AND the user taps the ’Terms & Conditions’ button
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be navigated to the Terms & Conditions screen
AND the Terms & Conditions information will be available to the user in a form of a web view

title: User is navigated to Privacy Policy screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Homepage
custom_steps:
WHEN the user scrolls down to the Help section
AND the user taps the ‘Privacy Policy’ button
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be navigated to the screen
AND the Privacy Policy information will be available to the user in a form of a web view
